Vacuum mode cleans hard-to-reach areas, blowing mode clears keyboards/air vents, inflating mode maintains air mattresses, and suction compression mode extracts air—perfectly suited for home, car, and camping scenarios.

This design is especially crucial for allergy sufferers.

It's perfect for car interiors, offices, pet hair cleanup, and home/kitchen use. For example: - The dustbin effectively removes surface dust - The brush head cleans hard-to-reach corners and vents - The mini floor brush handles soft surfaces like sofas - The air pump brush inflates inflatable rings, air mattresses, and more

【Cordless Free Portable Use】This hand held vacuum cordless vacuum cleaner is compact and portable, but still has the power of professional cleaning.
